Table of Contents

Name

orbmax - Tabulate radial maxima (or minima) along an orbit

Synopsis

orbmax [parameter=value]

Description

Finds the extrema in radius (currently X-Y plane only) or an orbit. Tabulates: 
  time    angle(radians)     x     y     radius

Parameters

The following parameters are recognized in any order if the keyword is also given:
in=
Input orbit [???]
mode=
1: show max 2: show min 3: show [1]
first=
Also try and figure out if first point. [f]

Author

Peter Teuben

Update History


30-Jul-09    V1.0 Created    PJT
